Questions: My thoughts were focused on an external task or activity
Label: Task

Questions: The emotion of my thoughts was positive
Label: Emotion

Questions: My thoughts were detailed and specific
Label: Detailed

Questions: My thoughts contained information I already knew
Label: Knowledge

Questions: I was absorbed in the contents of my thoughts
Label: Absorption

Questions: My thoughts were distracting me from what I am doing
Label: Distracting

Questions: My thoughts were as if I were the character in the film
Label: Perspective

Questions: My thoughts involved evaluating information and forming opinions
Label: Evaluative

Questions: How strong were your current feelings?
Label: Arousal
